package.name: testdisk
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi ./configure --sysconfdir=/etc --prefix=/usr --without-ntfs --enable-qt if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then pump make -j $jobcount else make fi
package.install:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make install mkdir -p /usr/share/icons install -m 0644 src/photorec_64x64.png /usr/share/icons
# Icon erstellen
cat >> /usr/share/applications/qphotorec.desktop << QPICON
[Desktop Entry] Version=1.0 Encoding=UTF-8 Type=Application Name=QPhotoRec Comment= Categories=CB-Rescue; Exec=sudo /usr/bin/qphotorec Icon=/usr/share/icons/photorec_64x64.png Terminal=false StartupNotify=true
QPICON
